citations.desc: Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC).
citations.narrative:
In a May 17, 2024 report to the Institutional Official about the January 17, 2024 semi-annual inspection of the facility's
program for humane care and use of animals, three significant deficiencies were identified by the IACUC, but there was
no corresponding plan and schedule with dates for correcting each deficiency.
A significant deficiency is one which, in the judgement of the IACUC, is or may be a threat to the health and safety of the
animals. As such, the semi-annual report must contain a plan and schedule with dates for correcting these deficiencies.
To be corrected by: August 1, 2024
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the attending veterinarian..
n

narrative:
2.31(c)(3) 
   
Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC). 
In a May 17, 2024 report to the Institutional Official about the January 17, 2024 semi-annual inspection of the facility's 
program for humane care and use of animals, three significant deficiencies were identified by the IACUC, but there was 
no corresponding plan and schedule with dates for correcting each deficiency.  
A significant deficiency is one which, in the judgement of the IACUC, is or may be a threat to the health and safety of the 
animals. As such, the semi-annual report must contain a plan and schedule with dates for correcting these deficiencies.  
To be corrected by: August 1, 2024 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the attending veterinarian.. 
 
 n
